//分类生成
	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

variableComment:
输入数字设置搜索列表数量，过大无效。
1为1个，2为2个，3为3个，以此类推。
不设置或0清空显示全部列表。

往期期刊设置，例如＂读者＂，路径：阅读app>发现>看刊宝/参考期刊api>文学小说>读者>书籍信息(看简介中序号说明)>右上角┆>＂设置书籍变量＂填上相应序号，然后刷新

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
source_url = baseUrl.replace('/004?','/005?');
data = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data;

con  = data.map($=>{
	  // year = $.year;
l =	$.data.map(($,i)=>{	
		intro =  '【'+$.qishu+'】';
		url =  baseUrl.replace(/qishu=.*&bkId/,"qishu="+$.qishu+ "&bkId"); 				
return	 JSON.stringify({"intro":intro,"url":url});
	});
return l
	}).join(',');
	$ = JSON.parse(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify("["+con+"]")));

n = 0;
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;
url = $[x].url;

result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换期刊(默认0)\n🎯当前期刊：序号🔺'+x+'🔻'+$[x].intro+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻'+$[i].intro;
	}
result.tocUrl = $[x].url;
result.remark = y;
}

result = JSON.stringify(result);

}
catch(e){
	result = JSON.parse(result).data;
	result.tocUrl = baseUrl;
	result = JSON.stringify(result);
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list = [];
   $ = JSON.parse(src).data.bmData;
for(i in $){
  	list.push({"text":$[i].bmName,"vo":1});
   	l = $[i].bmNews;
for(m in l){
		url = "/JunJiProject/app/news/001?newsId="+l[m].newsId;
		list.push({"text":l[m].newsTitle,"href":url})
	}
}
list
</js>

<js>
//从豆瓣获取封面
var pic="";
let j=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://book.douban.com/j/subject_suggest?q="+book.name));
j.map(o=>{
if(o.title==book.name){pic=o.pic}
});
if(pic.length<3&&j.length>0){
pic=j[0].pic;
}
result=pic
//java.log(result)
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

variableComment:

1为1个，2为2个，3为3个，以此类推。
不设置或0清空显示全部列表。

intro=book.intro?book.intro:"";

</js>

<js>
h = "https://m.wpxs.cc/"
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));


c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro: 🔔 更新时间：{{java.timeFormat(java.getString('$.update_time')*1000)}} 🏅 评分：{{$.attribute.score}}分 🏷 标签：{{$.book_tag_list[*].title##\s##，}} ♠️ 来源：{{$.statement##如有疑问.*}} 📂 简介：{{$.intro}}
ruleBookInfo.name: $.title

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
$.lastChapter
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(result));
if(baseUrl.match(/\?keyword=/)){
if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result
